tool.name: Train

param.name: dataset
param.label: Choose a data set for training

param.name: maskchannel
param.label: Provide the mask channel number for the imageset

param.name: dnachannel
param.label: Provide the dna channel number for the imageset

param.name: cellchannel
param.label: Provide the cell channel number for the imageset

param.name: proteinchannel
param.label: Provide the protein channel number for the imageset

param.name: trainflag
param.label: Selected the cellular components desired for modeling

param.name: modelname
param.label: Provide a name for the model

param.name: modelid
param.label: Provide an (optional) id for the model

param.name: dimensionality
param.label: Dimensionality:

param.name: downsamplex
param.label: Select a downsampling factor in the x dimension, larger values return a possible more coarse model

param.name: downsampley
param.label: Select a downsampling factor in the y direction, larger values return a possible more coarse model

param.name: downsamplez
param.label: Select a downsampling factor in the z direction, larger values return a possible more coarse model

param.name: verbose
param.label: If true, print all information provided during training (advanced feature)

param.name: debug
param.label: If true, save intermediate results (advanced feature)

param.name: nucleustype
param.label: Select a nuclear model type

param.name: nucleusid

param.name: cellname

param.name: proteinname
